About BioSimulators-GillesPy2

License

This package is released under the

MIT License

. GillesPy2 is released under the

GPL 3.0 License

.

Development team

This package was developed by the

Karr Lab

 at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai and the

Center for Reproducible Biomedical Modeling

. GillesPy2 was developed by the

Drawert Lab

 at the University of North Carolina, Asheville.

Questions and comments

Please contact the

BioSimulators Team

 with any questions or comments about the command-line program or
Docker image. Please contact the

GillesPy2 Team

 with any questions or comments about GillesPy2.
